records.location_details: A dead body was detected by Hellenic Police Officers patrolling the operational area in the Evros Area, specifically in the Evros River.
records.context_note: Hellenic Police Officers detected a dead body (male, 20-25 years old) in the Evros Area. No travel documents were found. The body was transferred to Alexandroupolis hospital, and an autopsy was requested by Hellenic Police to determine the cause of death. The results will be available in a follow-up SIR.
records.evidence_quote: Dead body found in Evros River
